thread.title: F**k A Thug: Brother Who Broke Up Kids Fighting Gets Emotional While Being Honored [Video]
thread.title_full: F**k A Thug: Brother Who Broke Up Kids Fighting Gets Emotional While Being Honored [Video]

author: charlieblanko
title: F**k A Thug: Brother Who Broke Up Kids Fighting Gets Emotional While Being Honored [Video]
text:
Ibn Ali Miller is the black man who went viral in a video showing him stepping in and stopping some young men from fighting. He was honored yesterday by Atlantic City for his heroic deed to society. During the interview, Miller gave thanks to the education his mom put inside him and got a little emotional giving praises, understandably.
6ABCACTIONNEWS
